column4: students from Thma Koul High School collapsed on the afternoon of December 7th.------This cause is not yet known
column6: most of the fainting students were female students. ------Police have confirmed that some of the students who were in the worst condition were sent to the provincial hospital. According to the initial information
column7: up to 50 people may have been affected.------This comes 3 days after a number of students fainted at ------Sampov Loun High School ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/746582.html------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/393681------ ------
